title: Tekken Tag Tournament 2
summary: Tekken Tag Tournament 2 is a sequel to the Tekken fighting game series, released on June 9, 2012. It received an update, subtitled Unlimited, on December 15, 2012. A console version based on the update was released for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 in September 2012, prior to the update. It was ported to the Wii U as one of the system's launch titles in November 2012, subtitled Wii U Edition. It is the eighth installment in the Tekken fighting game series.
